attributes.action: Replace the pelican crossing on St Cenydd Road, Caerphilly with a footbridge
attributes.background:
The pelican crossing outside St Cenydd School (on the B4263) in Caerphilly causes major traffic disruption, both in the mornings and afternoons at the start and end of school hours.
Replacing it with a footbridge or other means would alleviate the traffic build up.
